content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the context from which the ideas expressed in the excerpt emerged?

choices.label: Popular opinion supported intervention in Europe against France.
Political leaders sought to encourage domestic economic development.
Voters pressured state governments to drop property restrictions on voting.
Religious revivals encouraged the widespread development of reform movements.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
